scripts.build.bundlers: npm run build.component-lib && npm run build.parcel && npm run build.vite
scripts.build.component-lib: cd test-bundler/component-library && npm ci && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build.parcel: cd test-bundler/parcel-bundle-test && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build.vite: cd test-bundler/vite-bundle-test && npm run build && cd ../..
